Hiya. This is quite a good DVDrip! Anyway, here's the facts :
1. The video quality sure is dvdripped, but slightly blurry.
2. The audio gradually falls out of sync during the whole movie. But it's very little; at the end there's almost a second's difference between the video and audio.
I guess it matters in a film where there's a lot of action. But if you're not into small details, then this movie's great for you!
it gets out of sinc because it IS a cam...you can hear the speakers from behind the recorder if you use 5.1 sound or better
